issue.title: trk.ecomm.lenovo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://trk.ecomm.lenovo.com/ss/c/u001.-YHglJ7lBF72mHdRxJdWuPEIpFy9znaefIkbzbJDss3ScFwbK0gyxloZv_2e6kneNFmweqhkrE6KFSxz-2In_w/4iq/vomFHuDrQ3WBdgz14mLwvw/h1/h001.GX1oapC_YG0qQh_Mw0ba8Yp7qGWo6JXahzS6BC31B30](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftrk.ecomm.lenovo.com%2Fss%2Fc%2Fu001.-YHglJ7lBF72mHdRxJdWuPEIpFy9znaefIkbzbJDss3ScFwbK0gyxloZv_2e6kneNFmweqhkrE6KFSxz-2In_w%2F4iq%2FvomFHuDrQ3WBdgz14mLwvw%2Fh1%2Fh001.GX1oapC_YG0qQh_Mw0ba8Yp7qGWo6JXahzS6BC31B30)
### Comment
> AdGuardDNSがオンのとき、メールでのリンク先が正しく表示できない。
> オフにすると、正しく表示される。
```
Username: @Planar85mmF1.4
```

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/249zpaqrsz8kwcsgo8swc8gc484okcwj7c98du26zk.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/a72n0n19y5cgsgg004kogcogscscwwoeb8csnhnkrc.png?nc=1)
</details>

System version: | `Windows 10`
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

comment.body:
@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers When I check the filtering log, the element is hidden by this rule

```adblock
dagelijksestandaard.nl,puna.nl,sportbookies.nl,viraal.nl,wielrennenuptodate.nl##.raw-html-component
```

However, when I check the repo, I can't see this rule anywhere. Can anyone reproduce?
